participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Determined and creative, Jessica is passionate about music and strives to achieve her dreams. She's also adventurous, with a penchant for roleplaying games.
participant_1.background: I'm going to sign up for a singing competition and show my parents that I can make a career out of it. I play D&D. I sleep most of the day. Before I was a mom in telecommunications, I was a sniper in the army. My mom would have been proud of me for talking my way out of the ticket.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Outspoken and a bit cynical, Mark has a deep love for music and enjoys collecting comic books. He has a strong sense of responsibility and commitment to his family's business.
participant_2.background: I love being able to use my music to help children in need. I am a twenty five year old comic book collector. I've been working at my parents' business since I was a kid, so I've got a lot of experience in the field. I play the bass guitar. I'm not a nice person.

content.text: Hey, I hear you're a musician. What do you play?
I play bass guitar. It's one of my favorite things to do.
That's awesome! I love music. What kind of music do you play?
I like to play a lot of different kinds of music, but I mostly play rock and blues.
That's cool. I like to play D&D.
What's that?
It's a roleplaying game. You create a character and then go on adventures.
That sounds cool. I've never heard of it before.
You should try it sometime. It's really fun.
Maybe I will.
I'm going to sign up for a singing competition and show my parents that I can make a career out of it.
That's awesome! I wish you the best of luck.
Thanks!
What do you do for work?
I'm a mom in telecommunications, but I used to be a sniper in the army.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to be in the army.
It was a lot of fun, but it's also really hard work.
I bet it was.
It was, but I'm glad I did it.
Me too.
